short_description: Pet Camera with Treat Tossing: Combination of the dog camera and treat dispenser (0.5L capacity, Recommend 7-15mm food size), you can fill in your fur kid’s favorite treats in the treat dispenser and toss a treat to them remotely via the phone app while you are not at home. Let your dog experience your virtual presence.

Unlock the Time Album with Cloud Subscription: AI automatically create a 60-second video of your pet’s best moments from motion-triggered recordings, and saves it for 30 days, Download anytime & One-tap social sharing. Relive your pet’s funniest zoomies, naps, and milestones—Zero manual effort! Perfect for busy pet parents who want to capture every paw-some moment!(Important: This New feature Available with cloud subscription!)

2K Ultra HD Camera & Night Vision：With 2K Full HD crystal clear pet camera indoor, you could see your furry puppy or cats clearly whenever you want. Our dog camera captures clear and detailed footage even in low-light conditions via intelligent infrared night vision.

Upgraded 360° Viewing Angle：The 355° pan rotation brings a 360° viewing angle, and uses the wide-angle lens to fully know the environment around your pet. This pet camera with phone app supports, motion, bark voice detection and AI auto tracking, when anomaly is detected, app will send a notification to your phone, you will not miss any important movements of your pets.

Interactive Two Way Talk: Our dog camera treat dispenser allow for real-time communication. With two-way talk, you can chat with your pet and hear them bark or meow. Express your love to them anytime, anywhere, ease their separation anxiety and cheer them up. We support both 5GHz 2.4GHz WiFi and compatible with Alexa/Google.

2 Storage Options: With Cloud Storage, you can enjoy 6S, 7 days of cycle recording for life, and have the option to upgrade to a month subscription for 30 days of continuous cycle recording. On the other hand, Memory Card support allows for 24/7 recording(up to 128G, Not included in the package). Choose the option that best fits your needs and preferences for keeping track of your pet's movements and behavior.

short_description: TREAT YOUR PET REMOTELY: Fling treats at varying distances or schedule automatic treating from the Petcube App. Compatible with a variety of dry, crunchy dog and cat treats. Up to 2lbs treat capacity.

MONITOR 24/7 FROM YOUR PHONE: With Petcube Bites Wi-Fi pet cam, check on your pet day or night with clear 1080p HD video, 138° wide angle view, and night vision. See up close with 3x zoom. Get sound and motion alerts.
CHAT WITH YOUR PET: With two-way audio you can speak to your pets and hear them bark or meow back. Tell them you love them from anywhere.

FREE CLOUD-BASED VIDEO STORAGE: Always see the last 4 hours stored on an interactive video timeline, no subscription required. Video recordings of your pet’s activity are triggered by sound and motion. Optional Petcube Care subscriptions provide 24/7 video history; extended video clips; smart alerts for barking, meowing, pets and people. All Petcube Care subscribers get access to perks that can save you hundreds of dollars a year on top brand pet supplies, products and services.

product_description: Product Description Petcube Bites is the most innovative Wi-Fi pet camera with treat dispenser. It lets you see, talk, toss treats, and reward your pet remotely. From the app on your phone, monitor your cat or dog in clear 1080p HD video and night vision, toss treats Angry Birds-style, say hello using 2-way audio, and get motion and sound alerts to make sure your pet and home are safe. Petcube Bites is the only treat camera that is Alexa and DRS enabled, so you can go hands free and never run out of treats to play with your pet. From the Manufacturer With over 100,000 satisfied pet parents, Petcube interactive pet cameras are designed to help care for your cat or dog when you are away. Petcube isn’t just a dog camera or a cat camera, it’s a savior for lonely pets. Petcube pet monitoring system helps remedy pet separation anxiety and give you peace of mind that your pet is safe. Petcube pet cameras provide a great home security solution too. Besides amusing your pets with a remote-controlled laser pointer or treat dispenser, you can keep tabs on home security as well.

name: ASFSKY Pet Camera 2K Indoor Cat Camera Auto-Tracking for Cats, Cat Laser, Motion Detection Alerts, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio of pet Monitor, Cat Dog Home Security Camera with Phone App （Light Green）
short_description: Cat Motion Detection & Alerts！ASF cat camera,Your cat’s special moment catcher! Smart AI automatically tracks your cat's every leap, stretch, or pounce, capturing every adorable moment no matter where it goes. When you're away, this cat cam will constantly protect your home, alerting you instantly when your cat appears in front of the camera, knocks over a toy, or behaves in an unusual manner. Plug-and-play setup takes 3 mins—perfect for busy pet parents. Never miss their silly mid-air leaps or sleepy snuggles while you’re at work or out

Remote Laser Play！Let the pet camera with laser turn apart time into fun time! We have a Manual Lens-Controlled Laser: Move the camera lens manually via app,the gentle, eye-safe laser will follow synchronously, and move like a small prey —cats go crazy chasing it! Sway slowly, make it “hide” behind pillows, then watch their tiny paws bat and zoom. This pet cam eases separation anxiety when you’re out, and you’ll giggle at their acrobatics from your desk. Keep your fur kid active, happy, and linked to you—no more bored napping, just playful moments shared even miles apart

Two-Way Audio！Your voice is their favorite sound! This pet monitor have crisp echo-free audio,image that you say “hi baby”to the phone on your commute,then watch cats stop naping and perk up, ears twitching toward the camera,they also can meow at the camera,tell you that they miss you too. Plus,pre-record “treat time!” or familiar instructions; when they meow for attention, you can soothe them instantly with your voice. No more wondering if they’re lonely. It’s like a little voice hug that keeps your bond tight, even when you’re apart

One-Tap Privacy Shield！When you need privacy time,Tap your phone, and the camera swivels shut + mutes—perfect for lazy Sundays in pajamas or family video calls. No more scrambling to cover the lens of the cat monitor. It lets you enjoy cozy, unguarded moments at home while knowing your fur baby’s nearby—peace of mind that keeps both you and your kitty feeling secure

2K Panoramic View！You can see every fluffy detail like you’re home! Crisp 2K resolution catches your cat’s tiny whiskers twitch, fur patterns glow in sunlight. 355° pan-tilt spins smoothly—swipe your phone to scan the couch cushions, bookshelf nooks, or under the bed when they play hide-and-seek. Night vision from this petcam is soft, no harsh glow, so you watch their midnight zoomies without startling them. No blind spots, just crystal-clear moments of your fur baby being their adorable self, day or night

Share & Save Highlights！Turn fleeting cuteness into forever memories! Invite grandma, your cat-obsessed bestie, or partner to join the fun—they’ll get real-time updates too, and gushing over your kitty’s latest antics. You can replay clips of their first laser chase win or sleepy head-butts on the couch, then download to make a “fur baby yearbook.” Supports local (128GB TF card sold separately) & cloud storage—no fear of losing that cutest moment. It’s not just a monitor; it’s a gift that wraps up every precious moment, making holidays extra special for cat lovers

Customer Experience First！To ensure a smooth using experience with your pet camera, we’re here to support you every step of the way. Whether you have questions about setup, or app operation, don’t hesitate to reach out. Perfect Christmas Holiday Gift for Pet Lovers! This cat Camera is Christmas gifts 2025 for family with fur kids, your loved ones, or even treating yourself. Wrap it as a heartfelt stocking stuffer or main Luxury Christmas gifts, it blends practicality with joy. This Stocking stuffers turns every moment into a warm, connected experience for both pets and their parent this festive season.

name: Automatic Cat Feeder with 2K Camera: 5G WiFi Automatic Dog Feeder with Night Vision,Cat Food Dispenser with 7L Large Food Storage Container for Multiple Pet,Detachable for Easy Clean -29 Cup
short_description: Go Out of Town Without Worrying : When you are traveling, attending a party or up too late to feed your pet at home, smart automatic cat feeder will regularly schedule your pet's daily food for you. No matter where you are, you can monitor your pet's daily routine and diet, as well as change your feeding schedule online, anytime, anywhere via the mobile app.

Feeding Schedule ( Regular Diet ) : Setting up a scientific feeding schedule for your pet (up to 15 meals per day, with a maximum of 20 portions per meal) with automatic dog feeder will not only improve your pet's eating habits, but also save pet owners' valuable time (you don't have to constantly think about whether your pet is getting food or not). Not only can you view your pet's feeding history in the app, but you can also view how much food is left in the dog food bowl via the camera.

Record Wonderful Moments ( Life ) : The Full HD 3 megapixel camera on the cat feeder automatic perfectly records every moment your pet is playing at home. Even when night falls, the infrared sensor in the camera provides clear night vision. It not only supports shooting and recording, but also supports storing data in TF card and cloud storage. (TF card supports up to 128GB) When you turn on motion detection, the APP will remind you when your cat is doing activities.

Dual-band WiFi : The Frienhund automatic cat feeder with camera supports dual-band WiFi (2.4GHz & 5GHz). Dual-band network lets you don't have to modify your router for channel compatibility issues. Faster 5G networks allow for more stable, crisp video quality.

Stay Close to Your Pet : “ Two-way Audio ” allows you to talk to your pet in real time. If your cat is sensitive to sound, you can adjust the volume of the feeder through the “Device Volume” in the APP. auto cat feeder supports various terminal logins, in addition to remote control via mobile phone or tablet, you can also log in to the IPC terminal via PC browser to keep your mischievous cat or dog company at all times.

Dog Food Storage Container : 7L (29 Cups) Large capacity cat food storage with desiccant continuously provides your cats or large dogs with fresh food for weeks. The 360° transparent food tank makes it easy to visualize how much food is being consumed.

No Longer Knocked Over : Are you angry about the active cats or large dogs in your house always knocking over the dog food bowl? The auto cat feeder is specially designed for this purpose with a carabiner design, you can flexibly attach automatic pet feeder to the wall so that you don't have to worry about the food bowl being knocked over by your pets anymore.

Clean More Thoroughly ( Detachable ) : The automatic cat food dispenser （BPA-Free） has a removable food tank and stainless steel bowl. Individually disassembled Food Tank can be cleaned more thoroughly. Stainless steel bowls can be placed in the dishwasher for cleaning. These removable designs make eating more hygienic for your pet.

Dual Power Supply : The cat feeder has two power supply systems. DC 5V power adapter for daily use of the dog feeder. The 3 D cell batteries ensure your pet has a continuous supply of food when your home loses power. You can enjoy your vacation or work away from home with peace of mind. ( Dual power supply recommended )

Pet Lovers : Frienhund offers a free one-year warranty and 24/7 online service for automatic feeders. The automatic cat feeder is designed for all pet lovers like me, if you have any problems, you can contact us by order, email, or phone. We will solve your problem until it is solved.
